name: Footsteps App
description: Footsteps is a search 🔎engine of community-made 🧑‍🤝‍🧑learning resources for 21st-century learners.👨‍💻👩‍💻 Learn by following the footsteps (journey) of experts. The app runs with a companion browser extension for easy access and helps to bring the community chosen content from the experts to everyone.
